Type.Name: Icon

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Icon extends System.Object

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

public static string Lookup (Gtk.IconTheme icon_theme, Gnome.ThumbnailFactory thumbnail_factory, string file_uri, string custom_icon, Gnome.Vfs.FileInfo file_info, string mime_type, Gnome.IconLookupFlags flags, out Gnome.IconLookupResultFlags result);

.method public static hidebysig string Lookup(class Gtk.IconTheme icon_theme, class Gnome.ThumbnailFactory thumbnail_factory, string file_uri, string custom_icon, class Gnome.Vfs.FileInfo file_info, string mime_type, valuetype Gnome.IconLookupFlags flags, valuetype Gnome.IconLookupResultFlags result) cil managed

Docs.param: A icon theme to be used.
An optional thumbnail factory used to look up thumbnails.
Optionally the name of a custom icon to try.
The mime type of the icon.
flags that affect the result of the lookup.
Optionally the result flags of the lookups are stored here.
Docs.summary: Locate an icon that can be used to represent the file passed.
Docs.returns: The filename of the looked up icon.
